description: This file demonstrates the instantiation and usage of an Agent with a Cerebras model for reasoning tasks, including printing a response for a Fibonacci series script.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing reasoning tasks with a specified model.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent after executing a reasoning task.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
